comment: Class to hold details from which to extract a parameter for a setter or constructor.
codesample:
%REM
Adds a ConverterParam to retrieve an element from the current JSON object for the labelName passed, falling back to a defaultValue passed.
This is an abbreviated version of code in JsonCustomConstructor.withParam
%END REM
Function withParam(labelName as String, defaultValue as Variant) as JsonCustomConstructor
    Call redimParams()
    Set Me.params(UBound(params)) = new ConverterParam(&quot;JSON&quot;, labelName, defaultValue)
    Return Me
End Function
constructorsignature: Public Sub New(paramType As String, label As String, defaultValue As Variant)
